title: Crash with zero-length array
body:
Input program:
```
fn main() {
    let array: [i64; 0] = [];
}
```

Output:
```
Preparing to parse files.
SUCCESSFULLY PARSED CRATE
ran register_plugins (with no body)
SUCCESSFULLY REGISTERED PLUGINS
started injection
finished injection
SUCCESSFULLY FINISHED INJECTION
started expansion
finished expansion
SUCCESSFULLY FINISHED EXPANSION
rust1: internal compiler error: in get_array_elems, at rust/ast/rust-expr.h:1196
0x85cc83 Rust::AST::ArrayExpr::get_array_elems()
	../../gccrs/gcc/rust/ast/rust-expr.h:1196
0x85cc83 Rust::Resolver::ResolveExpr::visit(Rust::AST::ArrayExpr&)
	../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-ast-resolve-expr.h:200
0x747759 Rust::AST::ArrayExpr::accept_vis(Rust::AST::ASTVisitor&)
	../../gccrs/gcc/rust/ast/rust-ast-full-test.cc:5093
0x862650 Rust::Resolver::ResolveExpr::go(Rust::AST::Expr*, unsigned int)
	../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-ast-resolve-expr.h:36

	../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-ast-resolve-stmt.h:56

	../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-ast-resolve.cc:336
0x85ac7c _M_invoke
	/usr/include/c++/9/bits/std_function.h:285
0x84275d std::function<bool (Rust::AST::Stmt*)>::operator()(Rust::AST::Stmt*) const
	/usr/include/c++/9/bits/std_function.h:688
0x85b862 Rust::AST::BlockExpr::iterate_stmts(std::function<bool (Rust::AST::Stmt*)>)
	../../gccrs/gcc/rust/ast/rust-expr.h:2956
0x85b862 Rust::Resolver::ResolveExpr::visit(Rust::AST::BlockExpr&)
	../../gccrs/gcc/rust/resolve/rust-ast-resolve.cc:335
0x7479d9 Rust::AST::BlockExpr::accept_vis(Rust::AST::ASTVisitor&)
```
